Offroad_TemperatureTooHigh.text: Device temperature too high. System won't start.

Offroad_ConnectivityNeededPrompt.text: Immediately connect to the internet to check for updates. If you do not connect to the internet, openpilot won't engage in
Offroad_ConnectivityNeededPrompt._comment: Append the number of days at the end of the text

Offroad_ConnectivityNeeded.text: Connect to internet to check for updates. openpilot won't automatically start until it connects to internet to check for updates.

Offroad_UpdateFailed._comment: Append the command and error to the text.

Offroad_InvalidTime.text: Invalid date and time settings, system won't start. Connect to internet to set time.

Offroad_IsTakingSnapshot.text: Taking camera snapshots. System won't start until finished.

Offroad_NeosUpdate.text: An update to your device's operating system is downloading in the background. You will be prompted to update when it's ready to install.

Offroad_UnofficialHardware.text: Device failed to register. It will not connect to or upload to comma.ai servers, and receives no support from comma.ai. If this is an official device, contact support@comma.ai.

Offroad_BadNvme.text: Unsupported NVMe drive detected. Device may draw significantly more power and overheat due to the unsupported NVMe.

Offroad_CarUnrecognized.text: openpilot was unable to identify your car. Your car is either unsupported or its ECUs are not recognized. Please submit a pull request to add the firmware versions to the proper vehicle. Need help? Join discord.comma.ai.

Offroad_NoFirmware.text: openpilot was unable to identify your car. Check integrity of cables and ensure all connections are secure, particularly that the comma power is fully inserted in the OBD-II port of the vehicle. Need help? Join discord.comma.ai.

Offroad_Recalibration.text: openpilot detected a change in the device's mounting position. Ensure the device is fully seated in the mount and the mount is firmly secured to the windshield.
